name: cisatracurium_multiple_dosing_temp
description: Multiple dosing model for hydrolytic drugs (cisatracurium) with temperature correction. Combines Hofmann elimination kinetics, Arrhenius temperature dependence, and accumulation factor calculations for steady-state peak and trough concentrations.
